title: Strangers in Paradise 1 (2014 Color Edition|HR) (KFR)-(gesserit)
description: I'm calling this a "reverse scanlation", or perhaps a "scanscription": A German publisher re-released the "Strangers in Paradise" debut issue, translated into German and, for the first time ever, AFAIK, fully coloured, as one of this year's Free Comic Book Day ("Gratis Comic Tag") offerings. Somebody scanned and posted it; I grabbed it and replaced the German lettering with the original (taken from "Strangers in Paradise 001 (1993) (digital) (Son of Ultron-Empire)", which conveniently has the same page width as the German scanner's version)... and now you get to (re-)read it!
